title: Game play suggestions for consideration
body:
After seeing the new champ Taliyah, I wanted to put out some ideas I thought of that can better adjust to the current play style of the game. First thing I'm gonna suggest is making Taliyah's "w" - seismic shove available on herself, like {{champion:115}}. Of course this discussion is not limited to recent champions, or even champions only. It will give players a say in the development of changes to come as well as suggestions even the techies and schemers at riot can't think of.

Side note: {{champion:43}} 's empowered q - soul flare has two hit. Shouldn't the second proc deal more damage like many other mage's (e.g. {{champion:161}} ) skills?
